title: "Man Out On Parole Kills Laborer To Fake His Own Death, Sets Face On Fire"
excerpt: "A man out on parole was arrested after he tried to fake his death by killing a daily wage worker, setting his face on fire-- all to escape conviction. The incident took place in the northern Indian state of Uttar Pradesh."
